info.name: Hide Clear Downloads Button If You Cannot Click It
info.description:
This hides the Clear button from the Downloads List if nothing in the list.
Only displays the "Clear" button when you have download(s) to clear.

Why show a button that you can't click!?

Browser Versions:
- Works on Firefox 3

Integrates With Style 8297.
**Not to be used in conjunction with Style 8694 **


Changelog:
- Initial Release
